title: Font settings
body: Hello. I like classic theme. But I have one problem - there is no option on how to change font from aliased to **anti-aliased**. I want same theme but with modern font features, and do not know how to change it.
author: cprkv

comments.body: I've managed to get it via adding Classic.Avalonia libraries to my project with source code, and replace all occurrences to `RenderOptions.TextRenderingMode="Antialias"`. But this setup is a little to much I think. And if library will be updated I will not get updates. Some better solution needed...

Good point, just published a new `11.2.0.7` version, now you can set FontAliasing on the ClassicTheme to configure it to your needs, i.e.:
```
<classic:ClassicTheme FontAliasing="False" />
```

title: Fix white submenu text.
body: Noticed a bug with submenu text always displaying white. e.g. opening the File -> New would show the "Blank Page" and "From clipboard" text as white. I've removed the line that was causing this and now it displays correctly. I've also tested it with nested submenus.
author: rmp135

comments.body: That's right, this line was useless, thanks for your contribution!
